string.name: name
string.value: The Secrets Behind the Contract of Darkness
I met up with Manji, who knows something about the #b#t4031218##k.

Manji told me some things about the #b#t4031218##k. I couldn't believe what I was hearing. #b#t4031218##k can bring the dead's back to life, and the source of its energy is apparently #b#t4031218##k. That's why the zombies have been wandering around as if they are alive. The unfathomable force of #b#t4031218##k ... I need to find it and take them to Shammos. \n\n#t4031218# #b#c4031218##k/1
I gathered up the #b#t4031218##k and gave them back to Shammos.

About #b#t4031218##k? Hey ... how did you find out about it? It's not something you should be aware of ...? 
Who told you of it???
#L0#Someone around El Nath told me about it, and also told me of #b#t4031218##k.#l
#L1#I randomly heard of it while traveling. I want to learn about it too, in hopes of something important like this will help me on my future hunting endeavors.#l

Hmmm ... I don't know how you found out about it, but ... I think #b#t4031218##k is really a terrifying force. You've done your share of traveling, and I suppose you've never seen any monster that is supposedly dead, but still moves around as if it's alive, like #b#o5130107##k and #b#o5130108##k. They shouldn't be roaming around as if they're alive, but they are, thanks to #b#t4031218##k. It's the very force behind those two and other "undead" monsters moving around as if they're alive.

Did the person that told you of the story wants #b#t4031218##k?? That, that is... not something you can just pray for to get. It's very dangerous, and you should stop asking about that special iffy subject.
Oh, wow ... how did you ... how did you find #b#t4031218##k? I'm glad I trusted you to take care of this job. Hugh ... the things are going well for us now.
Hehe ... I need to get this plan in action ... I may need your help down the road ... please come see me some other time.
